TopicTitle: Input settings not being recognized by game on startup

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win10 | CPU: I710700K | GPU: Rtx2060 | RAM: 32gb

 

Repro steps: 

-have a craft with RCS

-head to input settings and change the rcs control for something else (in my case it is numpad, as it's more convenient)

-it should work on the craft from the go.

-close and restart the game and straight up load the craft. Try the new input, it doesn't work

-head to input settings again, it's saved, once you do that, it should work again.

It bothers me immensely.
